info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 9:24PM EDT until July 03 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN CUMBERLAND...PRINCE EDWARD AND NORTHWESTERN AMELIA COUNTIES... At 923 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Guinea Mills to near Farmville to Red House, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Cumberland, Farmville, Longwood University and Guinea Mills around 930 PM EDT. Rice around 940 PM EDT. Sunnyside around 945 PM EDT. Morven and Prospect around 950 PM EDT. Hampden Sydney College and Hampden Sydney around 1005 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Raines Tavern, Briery Creek Lake, Tuggle, Angola, Allens Mill, Rodophil, McRae, Hawk, Paineville and Kingsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
